text: Vilakkuvettom is a village situated near Punalur in Kollam district, Kerala state, India. == Politics == Vilakkuvettom is a part of Punalur assembly constituency in Kollam (Lok Sabha constituency). INC, CPM, CPI, BJP etc are the major political parties. == Demographics == Malayalam is the native language of Vilakkuvettom. == References == Category:Villages in Kollam district
title: Vilakkuvettom
